optimally by changing the locations and layout 
according to user eye gaze. 

Technologies : Machine Learning, NLP, Data 
Mining, Image Processing, Semantic Web, 
JavaScript, Python 

GARAGE & SERVICE STATION 
RESERVATION SYSTEM 

Implemented a web-based system for making 
garage and service station reservations along with 
a spare part buying and selling module. 

Technologies : SpringMVC, JDBC, Maven,  
Bootstrap, JavaScript, AJAX, GlassFish 4, 
Netbeans IDE, Servlets, JSP, MySQL 

HARDWARE PROJECT - ALL IN ONE 
GRINDER  

Implemented an all in one grinder for washing, 
drying and grinding things by using ATmega 32A 
microcontroller, C language, sensors, motors and 
other necessary devices. 

CONSTRUCTION FIRM RESERVATION AND 
MATERIAL BUYING SYSTEM 

As a self-motivated project, implemented an 
online construction firm reservation and building 
material selling system. 

Technologies : Spring Security, SpringMVC, 
Hibernate, Bootstrap, HQL, Maven, JSP 

SEMANTIC SEARCHING SYSTEM FOR 
TVSHOWS 

Implemented a semantic searching system for 
TVShows domain by using ontological modeling. 

Technologies : Ontological Modeling, OWL, 
SparQL, Apache Jena Fuseki  

THE FUTURE OF BRAIN COMPUTER 
INTERFACING AND HUMAN TO HUMAN 
INTERFACING. 

Carried out a research on the above topic as an 
independent study

 CHEITHYA VITHANAGE 
  

 

An energetic IT undergraduate with good business analytical   and   technical   

skills who is seeking for an opportunity to work as a Business Analyst. My   

biggest strength lies in the enthusiasm I possess, to achieve goals by accepting 

responsibilities, working for deadlines and making things happen than sitting 

around. I consider myself as a joyful person who beliefs self-satisfaction as 

the mean of success by being an asset to the organization.
